Question: This person was born at Ajaccio in Corsica in a family of noble Italian ancestry which had settled Corsica in the 16th century.
Hints: In 1840, Louis Philippe I obtained permission from the British to return this person's remains to France.
His Imperial Majesty **** I, By the Grace of God and the Constitutions of the Republic, Emperor of the French.
This person's physician, François Carlo Antommarchi, led the autopsy, which found the cause of death to be stomach cancer.
